concise_definition: v. 鼓励, 激励, 支持

definitions.explanation_en: To give support, confidence, or hope to someone, especially by positive words or actions that motivate them to continue or try harder.
definitions.explanation_cn: 通过积极的语言或行为给予某人支持、信心或希望，激励他们继续努力或勇于尝试。
definitions.example_en: Her teacher encourages her to speak up in class, even when she feels nervous.
definitions.example_cn: 她的老师鼓励她在课堂上大胆发言，即使她感到紧张。

definitions.explanation_en: To promote or foster the development or occurrence of something, often by creating favorable conditions or showing approval.
definitions.explanation_cn: 通过创造有利条件或表示认可，促进某事物的发展或发生。
definitions.example_en: The company encourages innovation by offering bonuses for new ideas.
definitions.example_cn: 公司通过为新点子提供奖金来鼓励创新。

definitions.explanation_en: To incite or urge someone to do something, often by expressing approval or enthusiasm.
definitions.explanation_cn: 通过表达赞同或热情，促使某人做某事。
definitions.example_en: The coach encouraged the team to push through the final lap.
definitions.example_cn: 教练鼓励队员们坚持完成最后一圈。

comparison.analysis: “Motivates” (激励) 更强调内在驱动力的激发，通常指引发一个人的欲望、目标或需求，使其主动行动。而 “encourages” 更侧重于外部支持和情感上的推动，常通过言语或态度给予信心。
“Supports” (支持) 含义更广泛，可指物质、情感、逻辑或制度上的援助，不一定包含激励或推动行动的意图。而 “encourages” 特指通过积极反馈来增强信心或推动行为，更具情感导向和主动性。
“Promotes” (促进) 常用于系统性、政策性或长期性的推动，如推广某种理念、产品或行为规范，语气更正式、宏观。而 “encourages” 更个人化、日常化，强调对个体的直接鼓舞和认可。
